aws::graph::propositions: Amazon 10-K Filing Operational Risk Factors
products, and services are offered by Amazon.
Amazon invests in technology and infrastructure.
Amazon invests in fulfillment.
Amazon invests in other expense categories.
Transportation prices affect Amazon's operations.
Fuel prices affect Amazon's operations.
Land availability affects Amazon's operations.
Water availability affects Amazon's operations.
Energy availability affects Amazon's operations.
Commodity prices for paper affect Amazon's operations.
Commodity prices for packing supplies affect Amazon's operations.
Hardware product prices affect Amazon's operations.
Technology infrastructure product prices affect Amazon's operations.
Inflationary pressures affect resource and product prices for Amazon.
Constrained labor markets increase Amazon's payroll costs.
Network operators may charge fees to grant Amazon customers access to online services.
Amazon's operations depend on ability to collect amounts owed when due.
New technologies may restrict online advertising capabilities for Amazon.
Existing technologies may restrict online advertising capabilities for Amazon.
Industry trends may restrict online advertising capabilities for Amazon.
Technologies may affect Amazon's ability to customize advertising.
Technologies may affect Amazon's ability to tailor product offerings.
Technologies may affect Amazon's ability to tailor service offerings.
Spyware affects use of Amazon's services.
Viruses affect use of Amazon's services.
Phishing affects use of Amazon's services.
Spam emails affect use of Amazon's services.
